= Chapter 5: Structured Programming =

== Common Library Functions ==
Function, Library Header, Description
scanf(), <stdio.h> (standard input/output), Reads data from the keyboard
printf(), <stdio.h>, Prints data to the computer monitor
isdigit(), <ctype.h> (character handling), Tests for decimal digit characters
islower(), <ctype.h>, Tests for lowercase letters
isupper(), <ctype.h>, Tests for uppercase letters
tolower(), <ctype.h>, Converts character to lowercase
toupper(), <ctype.h>, Converts character to uppercase
exp(), <stdio.h>, Computes the exponential
pow(), <math.h> (math functions), Computes a number raised to a power
sqrt(), <math.h>, Computes the square root
